## Learning Objectives

1) Learn how to write a compelling discussion section.

2) Learn how to link your results to the broader literature.

[Lecture Link](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1C2-ts5urdL1U4jPx50AnsKoRi0maP3ccYQp4PaHDdUA/edit?usp=sharing)


# Common Mistakes

*Just repeating the details of the results section*

*Forgetting to weave the results of the current work to past work*

*Weaving results to past work, but only in a tangential manner*

*Apologizing too much (just a student project, need more data*

*Concluding with "This topic needs more research"*
